Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Collective Rule[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Speeds the training of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Settlers[ENDCOLOR] by 50% in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and a free Settler appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL][NEWLINE]Capital. Give 4 global happines and +1 culture from monuments.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Collective Rule[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Speeds the training of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Settlers[ENDCOLOR] by 50% in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and a free Settler appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Collective Rule[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Speeds the training of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Settlers[ENDCOLOR] by 50% in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and a free Settler appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL][NEWLINE]Capital. Give 4 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] happines and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from monuments.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Collective Rule[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Speeds the training of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Settlers[ENDCOLOR] by 50% in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and a free Settler appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
